channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: $3 billion energy giant admits violating pollution limits in Louisiana—just like it did in Mississippi
item.description: Drax Global is already under scrutiny for running afoul of environmental laws in multiple states.

item.title: SpaceX repeatedly polluted waters in Texas this year, regulators found
item.description: SpaceX violated environmental regulations in releasing pollutants into or nearby bodies of water in Texas, a state environmental agency found.

item.title: A feared Iranian attack on Israel a top threat to stocks in a busy week
U.S. debt interest costs are about to blow past $1 trillion this fiscal year
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s aggressive interest-rate hiking campaign, aimed at quelling inflation, has made debt more expensive to issue.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says buying these quality defensive stocks is the best option for investors right now
item.description: Equity strategist Michael Wilson highlighted several quality and defensive names that are rated overweight by Morgan Stanley analysts.

item.title: Blink Fitness, gym operator owned by Equinox, files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy
Texas AG launches investigation into Houston utility company after power outages left some residents dead in their homes
item.description: Hurricane Beryl knocked out power to nearly 3 million people, and was responsible for at least three dozen deaths.

item.title: S&P 500 may struggle in the next two months, according to history of past volatility spikes
item.description: Bank of America found that the S&P 500 typically is lower two months after the Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) spikes above 45.

item.title: To fix Social Security, increasing the wage base should be part of the solution
Stocks usually take 6 months to recover from the type of selloff that just hit markets, BofA says
item.description: Following such pullbacks, 12-month returns on stocks were positive 73% of the time, analysts said.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: JetBlue, Hawaiian Electric, KeyCorp, Monday.com and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Dell’s stock is well off its highs. This analyst sees opportunity for investors.
Nate Silver charts the course of risk-taking, from Sam Bankman-Fried to Sam Altman
item.description: For Nate Silver poker, Sam Bankman-Fried, and the future of AI are all connected by one thing—risk-taking.

item.title: Three-year inflation outlook hits record low in New York Fed consumer survey
item.description: Consumers grew more confident in July that inflation will be less of a problem in the coming years.

item.title: One in four workers stays home to receive package deliveries
